ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Loot Rights Question
ygData.msgSnippet: It s all over the place here in the suburbs around Philly. been sick since thursday myself. Naeeldar ... From: Kimes, Dean W.
ygData.messageBody:
It's all over the place here in the suburbs around Philly. been sick since
thursday myself.

Naeeldar

----- Original Message -----
From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, February 12, 2001 3:07 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Loot Rights Question


> I escaped the evil flu, seem to be immune to it ever since having it real
> bad (hospitalized) when I was a kid. However, nearly everyone else I know
> in Denver has had it at some point over the last month. ;-(
>
> Hope you feel better, EQ and plenty of rest generally don't mix. ;-(
>
> Kitasi
>
> On another note, does anyone else have this damn flu going around? *cries*
>
> Halana, 59th Shammy
> Tani, 43rd Bard
> Paradigm
> Solusek Ro
